overview:
Life has presented Margie Mersky with the opportunity to create magical miniature pieces of very valuable artwork that people love to wear. This is never taken for granted as we walk the path of artistic creations. Talented hands have created things that shock each new viewer, because it is a rare blessing.

We are a minority, us jewelry artisans. A constant stand has been to create and produce pieces that will be admired a hundred years or more from now after two generations have worn themâ€¦ Leaving a legacy for a family to cherish. Quality is the only way to achieve this. Not much feels better than doing what you love to do for a living. Technology has taken us to a very high level, yet I ask you to never take for granted what your hands can craft from raw materials, from start to finish.

Just an artistic journey, a fine path to walk.
